name: producciones-saavedra-monorepo
description: Sistema Unificado de Gestión de Eventos con QR - Producciones Saavedra

scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.backend:lint: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend lint not configured'
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.backend:test: cd backend && npm test || echo 'Backend tests not configured'
scripts.frontend:test: cd frontend && npm test || echo 'Frontend tests not configured'
scripts.railway:build: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: Producciones Saavedra
